question: In which continent "Albertine Rift" is located?
explanation: Albertine Rift or Albertine Rift Mountains are located on the eastern side of the African continent. It forms the western branch of the East African Rift. It covers countries such as Uganda, Democratic Republic of Congo, Rwanda, Burundi and Tanzania. It houses geographical features such as Lake Albert, the Rwenzori Mountains, Lake Edward, Virunga Mountains, Lake Kivu and Lake Tanganyika. These mountains formed when the Somali plate split from the rest of the African continent due to tectonic movements.
